short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: DevTools extension for developing glass-easel applications

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
DevTools for debugging glass-easel applications.

Install the extension in the browser, and it will add a `glass-easel` panel in the browser DevTools (F12).

To debug glass-easel applications, the development builds of glass-easel should be used.

Checkout the GitHub project pages for more details.
